Wisdom: اشْتِغَالُكَ بِإِصْلَاحِ مَعَادِكَ يُنْجِيكَ مِنْ عَذَابِ النَّارِ
enWisdom: Occupying yourself with improving your Hereafter will save you from the chastisement of hellfire

Wisdom: خَيْرُ الِاسْتِعْدَادِ مَا أُصْلِحَ [صَلَحَ‏] بِهِ الْمَعَادُ
enWisdom: The best preparation is that by which one’s Hereafter is improved

Wisdom: لَيْسَ بِمُؤْمِنٍ مَنْ لَمْ يَهْتَمَّ بِإِصْلَاحِ مَعَادِهِ
enWisdom: He who does not concern himself with improving his Hereafter is not a [true] believer
Corrupting one’s Hereafter is from wretchedness

Wisdom: خُذُوا مِنْ أَجْسَادِكُمْ تَجُودُ بِهَا عَلَى أَنْفُسِكُمْ وَاسْعَوْا فِي فَكَاكِ رِقَابِكُمْ قَبْلَ أَنْ تُغْلَقَ رَهَائِنُهَا
enWisdom: Take from your bodies and bestow them generously to your souls, and strive to free yourselves before your ransoms are blocked
